adjective.description: Of or relating to a Tibeto-Burman people of the Kathmandu valley in Nepal, or their language.

noun.description: The language of the Newar people; = Newari.
A member of the Newar people.

origin: Early 19th century; earliest use found in William Kirkpatrick (1754–1812), army officer in the East India Company and diplomatist. From Newar (Newari Newār), vernacular name for Nepal and the Kathmandu valley among the original Tibeto-Burman population.
